definition: to cast (pour metal into a mold)
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Whole body cast, rigid, and stable performance.
sentences.chinese: 機身整體鑄造，剛性好，性能穩定。

sentences.english: But these new techniques can not be instead of the traditional way completely.
sentences.chinese: 但目前這些新技術尚不能完全取代熔模精密鑄造技術。

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大衛王的塑像是用青銅鑄造的，吸引了無數的雕塑家。

sentences.english: The authors have designed the casting process of the housing part from a factory.
sentences.chinese: 並結合工廠管卡零件進行了鑄造工藝輔助設計。

sentences.english: Terry Allen burning off bolts on drawbar center casting.
sentences.chinese: 特里艾倫燒製螺栓在拉桿上中心鑄造。

sentences.english: A computer program has been developed by the authors to design the casting technology for steel castings.
sentences.chinese: 作者開發了鑄鋼件鑄造工藝計算機輔助設計程序。

sentences.english: The human dress is forged iron.
Explain how Minting's needs were being satisfied by the 4Ps of the products.
sentences.chinese: 解釋如何鑄造的需要被滿足由產品的4Ps。

sentences.english: A sort of chilled nodular iron camshaft was developed by adopting resin-coated sand shell mould casting process.
sentences.chinese: 開發了一種採用樹脂砂殼型鑄造的激冷球鐵凸輪軸。

sentences.english: Nonferrous Metal Foundries Industry in the U. S.
He's made by steeling, by suffering.
Effects of the specific pressure on nucleation rate and linear growth velocity were expounded in squeeze casting.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了擠壓鑄造比壓對形核率及成長線速度的影響。

sentences.english: Foundry crane is mainly used to carry melting steel and iron.
sentences.chinese: 鑄造起重機主要用於吊運鋼水或鐵水。

sentences.english: The workers are casting a stainless steel bust.
sentences.chinese: 工人們正在鑄造一座不鏽鋼的胸像。

sentences.english: Nowdays, these kinds of composites are mainly fabricated by powder metallurgical method or cast-questing method.
sentences.chinese: 目前其製備工藝主要採用粉末冶金法和擠壓鑄造法。

sentences.english: At the same time the theoritical difference between cast sintering and cast infiltrating was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 指出鑄造燒結與鑄滲原理是不同的。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
